title: Unveiling the in vitro, in vivo anti-inflammatory potential of Ocimum basilicum and in silico analysis of its phytocompounds targeting COXs proteins.
abstract: This study aimed to evaluate the anti-inflammatory potential of ethanolic extract of Ocimum basilicum seeds (EEOBS) through in vitro, in vivo, and in silico approaches.
journal: The Journal of pharmacy and pharmacology
